item.title: The best way to reduce screen time
item.description: The best strategy with diet is to eat healthier foods first; you’ll automatically reduce eating the bad stuff. Similarly, best way to limit screen time is to add non-screen experiences. For me, the only true digital detox is playing a physical sport. “As with any bad habit, perhaps the best way to break it isnâ€™t to put our energy into resisting the siren song, but into singing a different tune. In a self-regulation society, that might be the best we can do.
